cbinstall.name: jAwards-Tab
cbinstall.author: Armin Hornung
cbinstall.description:
Provides a User Tab that shows awards or medals handed out to the user by the component jAwards.
Tab Version 0.6 for jAwards 1.1 or later (Joomla 1.5 native). Ported to Joomla 1.5 native with help of Chris Lehr.

param.name: showAwardsDesc
param.label: Show link to Awards description
param.description: If checked, a link to the description page of the awards will be shown.

param.name: awardsDesc
param.label: Awards description URL
param.description: Leave empty to link to the default overview page of the jAwards-component, or enter any URL you want to link to (e.g. a static page with custom description)

param.name: maxGrouping
param.label: Maximum number of medal images to group
param.description: When grouping is enabled in the general jAwards configuration, the tab can display this number of stacked medal images at most. The complete number is written next to the medal images, regardless of the setting here..

param.name: numAwards
param.label: Number of awards per page
param.description: How many awards should be displayed per page?
